title: Shadow Veil

properties.name: description
properties.value: Shadow Veil is a spell within the Arceuus spellbook that requires 47 Magic and completion of A Kingdom Divided quest to be cast.

content:
Shadow Veil
Released 16 June 2021 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 47
Spellbook Arceuus
Type Utility
Experience 58
Runes 5 5 5
Casting speed 1
Cooldown 50 ticks
Quest A Kingdom Divided
Description Reduces your chance of being caught when pickpocketing
Animation
Sound Effect

Shadow Veil is a spell within the Arceuus spellbook that requires 47 Magic and completion of A Kingdom Divided quest to be cast.

While under the effects of Shadow Veil, players have a 15% chance to avoid being stunned and damaged while pickpocketing NPCs. This stacks multiplicatively with the dodgy necklace, where Shadow Veil will attempt to avoid the stun first for a total of 36.25% chance to not take damage from a failed pickpocket[1]. The spell does not affect the success rate of blackjacking[2]. The effects of the spell remain active for a duration ( 0.6 ∗ Y {\displaystyle 0.6*Y} seconds), where Y {\displaystyle Y} is the player's Magic level at the time of casting. Players can only cast Shadow Veil once every 30 seconds. (Resulting in level 50 Magic providing 100% uptime via lasting the full 30 seconds to cast again. Higher Magic levels will reduce the need to cast as often.)

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 25 June 2021. (Archived from the original on 25 June 2021.) Mod Ash: "The Veil tries first, with its 15% roll. If it succeeds, the NPC doesn't shout. If that fails, the NPC shouts, and then the necklace does its 25% roll. So your chance of dodging the penalty is indeed the 36.25% you calculated, and you can see which one happened to you."
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 23 August 2021. (Archived from the original on 28 August 2021.) Mod Ash: "It does not help with that."

[[File:Shadow Veil icon (mobile).png|left]]
'''Shadow Veil''' is a spell within the [[Arceuus spellbook]] that requires 47 [[Magic]] and completion of [[A Kingdom Divided]] [[quest]] to be cast.

While under the effects of Shadow Veil, players have a 15% chance to avoid being [[Stun (status)|stunned]] and damaged while [[pickpocketing]] [[NPC]]s. This stacks multiplicatively with the [[dodgy necklace]], where Shadow Veil will attempt to avoid the stun first for a total of 36.25% chance to not take damage from a failed pickpocket{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1408410617623498757|date=25 June 2021|archiveurl=https://archive.is/UeTyL|archivedate=25 June 2021|quote=The Veil tries first, with its 15% roll. If it succeeds, the NPC doesn't shout.
If that fails, the NPC shouts, and then the necklace does its 25% roll.
So your chance of dodging the penalty is indeed the 36.25% you calculated, and you can see which one happened to you.}}. The spell does not affect the success rate of [[blackjacking]]{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1429717207647494145|archiveurl=https://archive.is/zh6Rr|archivedate=28 August 2021|date=23 August 2021|quote=It does not help with that.}}. The effects of the spell remain active for a duration (<math>0.6 * Y</math> seconds), where <math>Y</math> is the player's Magic level at the time of casting. Players can only cast Shadow Veil once every 30 seconds. (Resulting in level 50 Magic providing 100% uptime via lasting the full 30 seconds to cast again. Higher Magic levels will reduce the need to cast as often.)
